videoScript.text: Hey tech lovers! Big news dropped! Anthropic just released Claude 3.7 Sonnet.
It's their most advanced AI yet, offering near-instant responses and extended thinking.
And get this, they also launched Claude Code, a game-changer for developers.
Coding tasks just got a whole lot easier. I'm so excited to share this.
It can even write, test and commit code to GitHub Are you ready to level up your coding game?
So, what will you build with Cloud 3.7? Let me know in the comments!
